title: Unable to Open Since New Patch (Mac)
body: Last night League was working perfectly, and I tried opening earlier today and it wasn't opening due to UserKernel not responding I believe. I would open the app, the banner would pop up, and nothing would happen. I deleted the app, and I'm trying to reinstall it but I can't even reinstall the game because UserKernel isn't responding and the same exact thing is happening again. I open it, the banner pops up, and nothing happens after that. It says LoLLauncher is open, but I don't see it. This is really annoying as I've restarted my computer multiple times when it was working just yesterday and now I can't even reinstall the game. Please help.

replies.body: Are you able to reinstall if you reboot your Mac and uncheck the *reopen my applications* dialogue? Let me know if you still run into issues.
